alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Faulkner and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mayflower, or near Conway, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Little Rock... Conway... Sherwood... Maumelle... Little Rock AFB... Mayflower... Gibson... Morgan... Marche... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Olmstead... Gravel Ridge... Camp Robinson... Hamlet... Saltillo... Macon... Cato... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 130 and 136, and between mile markers 139 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
